name: Hack n Slash Prototype
description:
This is the first game I have made and I'm making it on my own, but unfortunately not from scratch. Doing this just as a hobby. I followed Heartbeast's Youtube series for the Hack n Slash series, which I highly recommend checking out. The art assets are also from Heartbeast's tutorial. Also followed FriendlyCosmonaut's tutorial for making a menu. The music is also not mine, I got it from Helltaker(Vitality) and Under Night In-Birth Exe:Late[cl-r](Sound of Night Wind). Everything besides the gameplay is just placeholders for now. The options menu works ok but I am not worrying about that right now as the gameplay is what is most important to me. Feel free to test the options out but I am aware of the amount of bugs in them which I will fix later on. Remappable inputs works, but is not fully polished yet as some text just says numbers for the input. Controller also works well I think, can connect it, disconnect it, and connect it again without having to restart the game.

What is already implemented but needs art assets:

Block break, more combos, and weapon swapping.

What is implemented but was scrapped and will be revisited:

Projectiles, and charged attacks.
